textAfterTable: 12 Items Biography Formed: 2010 in Toronto, Ontario, Canada Genre: Alternative Years Active: '00s, '10s A Canadian dream pop duo with a lo-fi style, Memoryhouse hail from Guelph, Ontario. The duo was founded in 2009 by photographer Denise Nouvion (vocals) and classical composer Evan Abeele (production). They named themselves after classical composer Max Richter's 2001 album of the same name and cite influences that include My Bloody Valentine, Galaxie 500, and Cocteau Twins. Memoryhouse made their recording debut in 2009 with "To the Lighthouse." In 2010 the duo released The Years, a four-track EP... Full bio Top Albums and Songs by Memoryhouse 1.
